examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I cancelled my Canva subscription the day I signed up for canva I’m not understanding why I am being charged $119!! This absurd and I want my money back. I’ve never even used the program because I CANCELED the subscription

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: You've taken money from my paypal for no reason. Can you end subscription on your end and refund me back my money as i cancelled subscription the same say i received it

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I’ve been charged for my Canva trial even though it’s not even past my trial date yet ! Additionally I’ve already cancelled the trial through my Apple account prior to the charge!! This is not correct and I’m not happy!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I did not purchase a subscription from you guys nor used this product online once. Please refund me my money. It’s showing I’ve lost money from you guys since July 2020.  You have 5 days to correct error.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I thought I canceled my free trial but must've not gone through on my end. I was just charged for this next month but haven't used canva in weeks. Is there any way to get a refund? I've already gone ahead and canceled and don't want to use canva this month.

What kind of problem?: Andet

Beskriv dit problem: Somehow, you took money from me today, saying I’ve subscribed to Canva pro, but I never have?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there, I don't have a subscription for PRO but I've been billed for 3 months. I did the trial but cancelled it, why am I still getting charged? Please get back to me I can't afford to pay this, thanks.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I’ve not used your service since month one. I want to cancel my subscription and get a refund. Thanks.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello! I’ve tried to cancel my automatic pro plan subscription for a few days now, but the app keeps  out. I’ve got video evidence from before the renewal date If needed. Can you please issue me a refund to my <EMAIL> account? My <EMAIL> account can remain pro. Thank you!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I've already cancelled this subscription, yet you guys charged my cash app card today. Why is this NOT CANCELLED yet?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have canceled my subscription with Canva or so I think. I am no longer using Canva and would like to know if a refund would be possible for any upfront payments I've made?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Please please please cancel my subscription I keep getting charged for this when I've asked for it to be cancelled and you had to refund me last month please help.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: My subscription won't cancel, I've been trying for a couple days and I thought it went through but I was charged still. I don't want this subscription and I don't use it. I would like a refund.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I would like to get a refund. I dont know how im even being charged for this. I've never even used this app.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I cancelled the subscription and I've just seen that you've taken the funds?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I cancelled my paid subscription yesterday as I'm no longer using it. However I've just been charged  $167.88 to my account.  I did not authorize this. If someone could please get back to me ASAP. 

Regards <NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I’ve never signed up for this. I see on my records I’ve been charged the last few months. This needs to be refunded and account terminated

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I’ve been reaching out and no one has helped me I purchased the Canva subscription and I’m not able to use it.I’ve provided all the details already and still no one is getting back to me. If I can’t get the help I need I would like a refund.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I got charged for Canva pro when I was trialing the service. I barely had time to use it and I've been charged a month unexpectedly. I've cancelled my subscription. Would you refund me for this month please? Best wishes, <NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I’ve been trying to cancel my canva subscription for months and it won’t let me. I keep getting charged but I don’t want premium. Please refund me and cancel the subscription. I literally don’t even get premium content on my account. Please cancel it. And Refund me.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: even though i subscribed 1 year CanvaPro we've been charged.
Want to refund it

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello,

I've notived sevearal months worth of Canva charges on my PayPal account worth $12.95. Can you tell me what this is? I've never used or purchased anything with Canva. How do I get these refunded? What is this? 
<NAME>

What did you have a problem with?: Credits

Describe your issue: Hi I've been wrongly billed for canva pro. I didn't sign up for this and I'd like my money refunded asap. Daniela sivevski

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have been charged multiple times by you guys and I don't even use that account. I've tried cancelling the subscriptions but I am still being charged. I liked all my money back!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I've been getting continuous billing since last year from the 9th of September 2020. That was never authorised and I have only just noticed that payments have been coming off my account. I've been going through a tough time not even notice that I've been getting charged for an app that I don't even use I need all my money back please total £54 and something. I have no invoices because I've never set up this thing.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I've been getting continuous billing since last year from the 9th of September 2020. That was never authorised and I have only just noticed that payments have been coming off my account. I've been going through a tough time not even notice that I've been getting charged for an app that I don't even use I need all my money back please total £54 and something. I have no invoices because I've never set up this thing

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I've been getting continuous billing since last year from the 9th of September 2020. That was never authorised and I have only just noticed that payments have been coming off my account. I've been going through a tough time not even notice that I've been getting charged for an app that I don't even use I need all my money back please total £54 and something. I have no invoices because I've never set up this thing

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: You guys have charged me for 3 months now for a subscription I never signed up for. I’ve never even used this app. I need a refund for the last three months. This is the last invoice number <NUMBER>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Please I request a refund, I've never used canvas. I believe someone is using my information. Please your help will be appreciated. Thanks

What do you need help with?: I've been getting continuous billing since last year from the 9th of September 2020. That was never authorised and I have only just noticed that payments have been coming off my account. I've been going through a tough time not even notice that I've been getting charged for an app that I don't even use I need all my money back please total £54 and something. I have no invoices because I've never set up this thing

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I’ve submitted more than once to stop being charged by you and to refunded my money. Both times I’ve responded with the details you have asked me for but I am STILL being charged. This is a total scam and you should be ashamed. For the last time, I demand you remove all my details from your systems and cease withdrawing funds unapproved from my account.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hey - didn't know how else to get in touch... is there any chance I can get a refund on my annual subscription which went through on 8 Jan - especially as I've not used this account this year? I am now using a different Canva account. 
Appreciate your help!
<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Every time I try and do something in Canva, like 'resize' and even though you've taken my money for the 'pro' version, it won't ket me do anything, it just keeps saying I should 'try pro', but I've ALREADY PAID FOR IT, and it's most unfortunate it takes TWENTY FOUR HOURS for a response. Not good at all!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi I cancelled my subscription days - maybe even more than a week ago and I got charged for another month. I've double checked that my subscription is not active. Please refund me ASAP.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I cancelled my subscription with you guys when I made the account around January. I'm confused why I've been charged when I don't use the account.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am trying to cancel my subscription and it won’t do it i’ve been tryna do this for 2 months

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi team -    I would like to cancel my service immediately.  I've never used it and I didn't realize I was going to be charged , as I thought I just did a free trial.   If there is a way to get a refund that would be great.

Thanks!

<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, 

I've just been charged the monthly payment for the Canva Pro, however, I've just cancelled and wish to stop using it immediately. Can you refund me for this month's subscription and cancel my pro subscription now as well? Thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I’ve canceled my subscription months ago and you guys still charged me

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I've tried to subscribe canvas pro but it says the transaction was declined, but the card has the money

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I thought I canceled my subscription a long time ago and I've been getting charged for it but I was also negligently paying the subscription but I still keep being charged and I don't know why.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I cancelled this months ago and now see that I've still been getting charged

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have a Canva Pro subscription but it won’t register that I do even though it’s tied to my Apple ID. I’ve redownloaded the app, cancelled the subscription and resubscribed, everything.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi 
I’ve just received an invoice for £107.88 I believe it’s an issue as we’ve cancelled my membership over email last week and I haven’t subscribed to anything since.
Thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I can’t seem to cancel my subscription- I thought I did several weeks ago but I’ve been charged again this month?

Describe your issue: I've been trying to cancel my subscription for months now.  I was unaware I was being charged.  there is not a "cancel" option under my account. please help to cancel immediately


What kind of problem?: Other

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I've been charged each month with USD12, however I've canceled in trial period.

Please let me know , thank you!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I cannot cancel my trial for canva pro. It just keeps spinning. I’ve been trying to cancel it for two days.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi , I wanted to do a monthly subscription but I’ve just been charged for the year . How can I get my money back ?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I don't remember ever agreeing to be charged for any of your services. I want a full refund of anything I've been charged.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Billing Issue! I've already paid my 1 year subscription and I am being billed again!

I want a refund for the money that was taken from me without my consent.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I'm not sure what I've been charged for? I don't recall purchasing anything and I've just received a charge

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Please cancel my Canva Pro account. I’ve been trying to do it for a couple months now and the cancellation never goes through.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi,
I purchased Canva Pro and I am still unable to use any of the features. I’ve canceled and resubscribed multiple times trying to fix it but nothing seems to work.

Thank you,
<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have been charged several months now.  I’ve tried to get this cancelled several times.  I even changed my debit card number but still getting charged.  Please help!!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, I've canceled my  Canva subscription a few months back. Yet I still receive a billing on a card ending in -9651. I want to get rid of this, get back to me with a solution as soon as you can.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Also, I've tried to request a refund and the system set up on here does not allow work right. It circles you back around and around.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I thought I deleted my account but I accidentally only unsubscribed. I’ve now been charged for a subscription that I didn’t want. Can you please help?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I canceled my Canva subscription back in late October and I just realized I've still been getting billed for something on behalf of Canva every 30th of the month. I still have the app but it does not show any active subscriptions.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have been charged $17.99 the last year but unable to access my account and use this subscription! I’ve tried fixing this and stopping this  payment to no avail and have tried contacting support too

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I never signed up for the canvas monthly and I see I’ve been charged numerous times now and I canceled the subscription because I never signed up for it in the first place

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I've been trying to cancel my canva subscription for 3 months butit won't let me get into the apple store and I no longer have a mac. Can you please cancel my subscription to canva pro as I dont want it anymore. Thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi. I've cancel my premium subscription before the end of my one month trial, but just have been charged for 1 premium month. I don't want to be a Canva member now, and I want a refund. Thanks ! :)

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: unarthorized Canva subscription and no pro perks. 

I've checked all of my accounts through you all and I am not signed up for canva pro on any of them. I see the payments are coming through via paypal from last month and this month. 

I need to be refunded as this was not authorized by me. 

Kind Regards, 
<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I've been trying to cancel my subscription and don't see how and I was charged.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, 

I've been charged on my card, and I've tried to cancel my subscription, but it says I don't have a subscription 

If this is the case why have  been charged? 

Thank you

What do you need help with?: Good morning,

I have an issue where I've been charged multiple months for Canva Pro, yet I am unable to utilize the features of canva pro.  I would like to get a refund for the months which I've not received the benefits of the upgraded version.

What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I am trying to cancel the canva charge without success. I urgently request this cancellation. Here, the option for this cancellation does not appear. I've tried it several times without success. so I also request a refund.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: i’ve paid for canva pro but it won’t let me use it

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I've made a mistake and unintentionally asked for a subscription to be activated on 9th Feb 2012 following an email received yesterday.
I do not need a subscription at this stage thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I've been charged but it not in my invoice so I cannot request a refund. Thank you

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I wanted to try Canva Pro. I tried <NAME>. I have entered all bank details. At the very end, Canva received an error message that it would not have worked. I've tried it three times. My account has been charged three times.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: My 1 year canva subscription is not still not active. I’ve been complaining for several days now. 

Please activate

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: when I go to the billing and teams tab nothing comes up for prescriptions. it says i have no active prescription yet my card keeps getting charged. it also gives no access to my card. this is a major problem. I will be contacting AMEX.  There is nowhere to cancel.  I've been trying to cancel  for OVER a month now.  thinking somethings wrong with me.  I need this account to be cancelled IMMEDIATELY and I would like reimbursement for the past months that you've taken from my account.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Would like to cancel ASAP, I’ve never used the app as it’s to difficult for me and have been paying for it apparently.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I had the same issue for a long time now. Is that i’ve been paying my subscription all this time but still don’t have the features. Is like I’m not a pro but I’m. Canva still  charge me every month. I cancel my subscription and did it again just in case but still nothing.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I’ve been charged to canva pro when I deleted my account

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there,

I noticed I’ve been charged by canva, however when I am logged in I do not have access to things that are not free?

Can I please have this amount refunded and cancel my canva subscription. 

Thank you,

Kayla 
<EMAIL>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I deleted my account on 8th Jan and today I've had an email to say that I've been billed. I've had to restore my account to send you this message as there is no other way to contact you. Please delete my account and refund for what I've been billed, thank you.
What kind of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: How can I cancel. I've tried it before by email and nothing happened! Money is still being collected

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I’ve pid for the renewal subscription. But, the features not updated

What do you need help with?: I’ve been trying to cancel my account but the ‘cancel’ button has been consistently grayed out every time I’ve tried. I’ve never used the app beyond the free trial and would like my account immediately cancelled and my money refunded.
